# Description of DataSchema variable 

* Short name: `adl_toilet`
* Variable label: `ADL-Difficulties for using the toilet`
* Domain: `Health status and functional limitations`
* Value type: `categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | yes
1        | no

* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing




```{r, dataDirectory, echo=FALSE}
datafolder <- "../RData"
``` 

```{r, jumping list, echo=FALSE}
l <- list('h1', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h7', 'h8', 'h9', 'h10', 'h11', 'h12', 'h13' )
```

<!-- ########################################################## --> 

# Data process

## Mexican population


### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description

 


* Name: `h19_1`
* Label: `Difficult using toilet`
* Categories:
    + `1 = Yes`
    + `2 = No`
    + `6 = Can't do`
* Missings
    + `7 = Doesn't do`
    + `8 = Doesn't answer`
    + `9 = Doesn't know`
    + `NA`



* Description: 
```{r assign w1,  echo=FALSE}
m <- append(l, 'h19_1')
opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'MHAS_w1_adl_toilet','Mexican Health Aging Study.MHAS-2001', variables=m, missings = TRUE)
```

```{r local w1,  echo=FALSE}
MHAS_w1_adl_toilet <- opal.execute(o,'MHAS_w1_adl_toilet')

vari <- MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h3 # VARIABLE
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[2], caption = attributes(vari)$`spss::shortName`)
# SI NO HAY ATRIBUTO SHORT-NAME, A MANO
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = NA)[1], caption = "Category")

#Categorical_summary(MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h19_1)
ggplot(MHAS_w1_adl_toilet, aes(x=factor(h19_1))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("ADL - Difficulty using the toilet") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `1 into 0` 
* `2 into 1`
* `6 Can't do into 0`
* `7 Doesn't do into 994`
* `8 Doesn't answer into 995`
* `9 Doesn't know into 998`
* `NA into 999`



**R script:** 


```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
#Checking whether this question was skaped for any subject:
length(which((MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h1==2)&
                              (MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h3==2)&
                              (MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h4==2)&
                              (MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h5==2)&
                              (MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h7==2)&
                              (MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h8==2)&
                              (MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h9==2)&
                              (MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h10==2)&
                              (MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h11==2)&
                              (MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h12==2)&
                              (MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h13==2)))
```



```{r harmo w1,   echo=TRUE}
MHAS_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$id)
MHAS_ds_w1$adl_toilet <- car::recode(MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h19_1, "1 = '0';2 = '1';NA = '999';6 = '0';7 = '994';8 = '995';9 = '998' ")
MHAS_ds_w1$adl_toilet <- labelled(MHAS_ds_w1$adl_toilet, labels = c(Yes=0, No=1,Missing=999, Do_not_know=998, Refuse=997, Not_applicable=996, Does_not_answer=995,  Not_attempt_not_done=994, Disable_to_measure=993, Impute=992, CAPI_interviewer_error=991))
```



#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript w1,  echo=FALSE}
vari <- MHAS_ds_w1$adl_toilet # variable you want to descrive
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3])
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")


#Categorical_summary(var = MHAS_ds_w1$adl_toilet, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))
ggplot(MHAS_ds_w1, aes(x=factor(adl_toilet))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("ADL - Difficulty using the toilet") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation w1,  echo=FALSE}
AfterH <- table(MHAS_ds_w1$adl_toilet)
X<-table(MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h19_1)
BeforeH <- c(sum(X[1],X[3]),X[c(2,4,5,6)],sum(is.na(MHAS_w1_adl_toilet$h19_1)))
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c("1,6->0","2->1","7->994","8->995" ,"9->998","NA->999") 
kable(C)
```

 
 


 
```{r importOPAL w1, echo=FALSE,  echo=FALSE}
val_labels(MHAS_ds_w1) <- NULL
label(MHAS_ds_w1$adl_toilet) <- "Difficulties for using the toilet"
opal.assign.data(o, 'MHAS_ds_w1', MHAS_ds_w1)
#opal.symbol_import(o,'MHAS_ds_w1', project='_Athlos_Harm_Dataset')

MHAS_m_ds_w1 <- MHAS_ds_w1
MHAS_m_ds_w1$adl_toilet <- car::recode(MHAS_m_ds_w1$adl_toilet, "c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997,998, 999)=NA")
opal.assign.data(o, 'MHAS_m_ds_w1', MHAS_m_ds_w1)
#opal.symbol_import(o,'MHAS_m_ds_w1', project='_Athlos_Harm_Dataset')
```

```{r,  echo=FALSE}
adl_toilet <- MHAS_ds_w1
save(adl_toilet, file = paste0(datafolder, "/w1/adl_toilet.RData"))
```
